divs: sighting detailsfrom a bedroom facing nw over sauble beach, lake huron, ontario canada, we noticed a big round white light up in the sky above the trees. while we were wondering if it was a star or a planet, all of a sudden it started flashing or pulsating the light. then it started going in circles, round & round in the same perfect circle for about 10 minutes each time. it would disappear, then appear again in an other area of the sky, still facing nw or w. this went on for about 1\2 an hour. we don't know how long it had been in the sky before we noticed it. we watched it from 3 nw facing rooms of our house. too scared to go outside. this happened on friday night between 10:10 p.m. & 11:10 p.m. march 29th, 2013. i didn't know of this website until today, so would have reported it right away.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Sauble Beach
There were no other sightings in Sauble Beach on or around March 29th 2013
Summary: Bright White Stationary Light. Then Flashing. The going in circles about 10 min. at at time in various areas. Did not see maneuvers. It just appeared in other areas going in circles. Could not see the craft, only the white lights. Hallf an hour.
